core_profiles.code.documentation: Generic decription of the code-specific parameters for the code that has produced this IDS

core_profiles.code.output_flag.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values mean some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used.

core_profiles.code.parameters.documentation: List of the code specific parameters in XML format

core_profiles.global_quantities.documentation: Various global quantities derived from the profiles

core_profiles.global_quantities.beta_pol.documentation: Poloidal beta. Defined as betap = 4 int(p dV) / [R_0 * mu_0 * Ip^2]
Index in the error_description list for "beta_pol"

core_profiles.global_quantities.beta_tor.documentation: Toroidal beta, defined as the volume-averaged total perpendicular pressure divided by (B0^2/(2*mu0)), i.e. beta_toroidal = 2 mu0 int(p dV) / V / B0^2
Index in the error_description list for "beta_tor"
Normalised toroidal beta, defined as 100 * beta_tor * a[m] * B0 [T] / ip [MA]
Index in the error_description list for "beta_tor_norm"

core_profiles.global_quantities.current_.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "current_bootstrap"
Index in the error_description list for "current_non_inductive"

core_profiles.global_quantities.energy_d.documentation: Plasma energy content = 3/2 * integral over the plasma volume of the total perpendicular pressure
Index in the error_description list for "energy_diamagnetic"

core_profiles.global_quantities.ip_error.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "ip"

core_profiles.global_quantities.li.documentation: Internal inductance. The li_3 definition is used, i.e. li_3 = 2/R0/mu0^2/Ip^2 * int(Bp^2 dV).

core_profiles.global_quantities.li_3.documentation: Internal inductance. The li_3 definition is used, i.e. li_3 = 2/R0/mu0^2/Ip^2 * int(Bp^2 dV).

core_profiles.global_quantities.li_3_err.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "li_3"

core_profiles.global_quantities.li_error.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "li"

core_profiles.global_quantities.v_loop_e.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "v_loop"

core_profiles.ids_properties.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

core_profiles.ids_properties.comment.documentation: Any comment describing the content of this IDS

core_profiles.ids_properties.homogeneous.documentation: 1 if the time of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the time values for this IDS are stored in ../time just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various time fields at lower levels in the tree.

core_profiles.ids_properties.occurrence.description: occurrence number [NOTE: this field only exists in OMAS and is not part of the ITER PDM]

core_profiles.profiles_1d.documentation: Core plasma radial profiles for various time slices

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].conductivit.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "conductivity_parallel"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].e_field.documentation: Electric field, averaged on the magnetic surface. E.g for the parellel component, average(E.B) / B0, using core_profiles/vacuum_toroidal_field/b0

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].e_field.dia.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "diamagnetic"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].e_field.par.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "parallel"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].e_field.pol.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "poloidal"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].e_field.rad.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "radial"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].e_field.tor.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "toroidal"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].e_field_par.documentation: Parallel electric field = average(E.B) / B0, where Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0
Index in the error_description list for "e_field_parallel"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].electrons.d.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "density"
Index in the error_description list for "density_fast"
Index in the error_description list for "density_thermal"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].electrons.p.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "pressure"
Index in the error_description list for "pressure_fast_parallel"
Index in the error_description list for "pressure_fast_perpendicular"
Index in the error_description list for "pressure_thermal"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].electrons.t.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "temperature"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].electrons.v.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "diamagnetic"
Index in the error_description list for "parallel"
Index in the error_description list for "poloidal"
Index in the error_description list for "radial"
Index in the error_description list for "toroidal"
Index in the error_description list for "velocity_pol"
Index in the error_description list for "velocity_tor"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].grid.area.documentation: Cross-sectional area of the flux surface

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].grid.area_e.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "area"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].grid.psi_er.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "psi"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].grid.rho_to.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate. rho_tor = sqrt(b_flux_tor/(pi*b0)) ~ sqrt(pi*r^2*b0/(pi*b0)) ~ r [m]. The toroidal field used in its definition is indicated under vacuum_toroidal_field/b0
Index in the error_description list for "rho_tor"

Normalised toroidal flux coordinate. The normalizing value for rho_tor_norm, is the toroidal flux coordinate at the equilibrium boundary (LCFS or 99.x % of the LCFS in case of a fixed boundary equilibium calculation, see time_slice/boundary/b_flux_pol_norm in the equilibrium IDS)
Index in the error_description list for "rho_tor_norm"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].grid.volume.documentation: Volume enclosed inside the magnetic surface
Index in the error_description list for "volume"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion.documentation: Quantities related to the different ion species

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion[:].dens.documentation: Density (thermal+non-thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "density"
Density of fast (non-thermal) particles (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "density_fast"
Density (thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "density_thermal"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion[:].elem.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule
Index in the error_description list for "a"
Index in the error_description list for "multiplicity"
Index in the error_description list for "z_n"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion[:].labe.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion[:].mult.documentation: Multiple states calculation flag : 0-Only one state is considered; 1-Multiple states are considered and are described in the state structure

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion[:].neut.documentation: Index of the corresponding neutral species in the ../../neutral array

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion[:].pres.documentation: Pressure (thermal+non-thermal) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "pressure"
Fast (non-thermal) parallel pressure  (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "pressure_fast_parallel"
Fast (non-thermal) perpendicular pressure  (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "pressure_fast_perpendicular"
Pressure (thermal) associated with random motion ~average((v-average(v))^2) (sum over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "pressure_thermal"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion[:].stat.documentation: Quantities related to the different states of the species (ionisation, energy, excitation, ...)
Index in the error_description list for "density"
Index in the error_description list for "density_fast"
Index in the error_description list for "density_thermal"
Configuration of atomic orbitals of this state, e.g. 1s2-2s1

Cumulative and average ionisation potential to reach a given bundle. Defined as sum (x_z* (sum of Epot from z'=0 to z-1)), where Epot is the ionisation potential of ion Xz’+, and x_z is the relative concentration of a given charge state in the bundle, i.e. sum(x_z) = 1 over the bundle.
Index in the error_description list for "ionisation_potential"
String identifying charge state (e.g. C+, C+2 , C+3, C+4, C+5, C+6, ...)
Index in the error_description list for "pressure"
Index in the error_description list for "pressure_fast_parallel"
Index in the error_description list for "pressure_fast_perpendicular"
Index in the error_description list for "pressure_thermal"
Index in the error_description list for "temperature"
Index in the error_description list for "diamagnetic"
Index in the error_description list for "parallel"
Index in the error_description list for "poloidal"
Index in the error_description list for "radial"
Index in the error_description list for "toroidal"
Index in the error_description list for "vibrational_level"
Vibrational mode of this state, e.g. "A_g". Need to define, or adopt a standard nomenclature.
Average Z of the charge state bundle (equal to z_min if no bundle), = sum (Z*x_z) where x_z is the relative concentration of a given charge state in the bundle, i.e. sum(x_z) = 1 over the bundle.
Index in the error_description list for "z_average"
Maximum Z of the charge state bundle (equal to z_min if no bundle)
Index in the error_description list for "z_max"
Minimum Z of the charge state bundle
Index in the error_description list for "z_min"

Average Z square of the charge state bundle (equal to z_min if no bundle), = sum (Z^2*x_z) where x_z is the relative concentration of a given charge state in the bundle, i.e. sum(x_z) = 1 over the bundle.
Index in the error_description list for "z_square_average"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion[:].temp.documentation: Temperature (average over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "temperature"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion[:].velo.documentation: Velocity (average over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "diamagnetic"
Index in the error_description list for "parallel"
Index in the error_description list for "poloidal"
Index in the error_description list for "radial"
Index in the error_description list for "toroidal"
Poloidal velocity (average over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "velocity_pol"
Toroidal velocity (average over charge states when multiple charge states are considered)
Index in the error_description list for "velocity_tor"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].ion[:].z_io.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed), volume averaged over plasma radius
Average charge of the ion species (sum of states charge weighted by state density and divided by ion density)
Index in the error_description list for "z_ion_1d"
Index in the error_description list for "z_ion"
Average sqare charge of the ion species (sum of states square charge weighted by state density and divided by ion density)
Index in the error_description list for "z_ion_square_1d"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].j_bootstrap.documentation: Bootstrap current density = average(J_Bootstrap.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0
Index in the error_description list for "j_bootstrap"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].j_non_induc.documentation: Non-inductive (includes bootstrap) parallel current density = average(jni.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0
Index in the error_description list for "j_non_inductive"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].j_ohmic.documentation: Ohmic parallel current density = average(J_Ohmic.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].j_ohmic_err.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "j_ohmic"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].j_tor.documentation: Total toroidal current density = average(J_Tor/R) / average(1/R)

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].j_tor_error.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "j_tor"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].j_total.documentation: Total parallel current density = average(jtot.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].j_total_err.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "j_total"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].magnetic_sh.documentation: Magnetic shear, defined as rho_tor/q . dq/drho_tor
Index in the error_description list for "magnetic_shear"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].momentum_to.documentation: Total plasma toroidal momentum, summed over ion species and electrons weighted by their density and major radius, i.e. sum_over_species(n*R*m*Vphi)
Index in the error_description list for "momentum_tor"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].n_i_total_o.documentation: Ratio of total ion density (sum over species and charge states) over electron density. (thermal+non-thermal)
Index in the error_description list for "n_i_total_over_n_e"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].neutral.documentation: Quantities related to the different neutral species

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].pressure_io.documentation: Total (sum over ion species) thermal ion pressure
Index in the error_description list for "pressure_ion_total"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].pressure_pa.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "pressure_parallel"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].pressure_pe.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "pressure_perpendicular"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].pressure_th.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "pressure_thermal"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].q_error_ind.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "q"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].t_i_average.documentation: Ion temperature (averaged on charge states and ion species)
Index in the error_description list for "t_i_average"

core_profiles.profiles_1d[:].zeff_error_.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "zeff"

core_profiles.vacuum_toroidal_field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition and in the normalization of current densities)

core_profiles.vacuum_toroidal_field.b0.documentation: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the b_tor_vacuum_r field of the tf IDS.

core_profiles.vacuum_toroidal_field.b0_e.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "b0"

core_profiles.vacuum_toroidal_field.r0.documentation: Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane)

core_profiles.vacuum_toroidal_field.r0_e.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "r0"
